page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE IN PENICUIK
page.content: MONDAY On Monday I get up around 7.30 a.m. and get dressed. I get my bag and guitar and around 8 o'clock I call for Keith. At 10 past 8 we go to school. When we arrive we put the milk in the classrooms and put out the computers. At 9 o'clock school begins. At 10.45 a.m. we have a break for 15 minutes. At 11 o'clock I go to guitar lessons. At 12.30p.m. I go home for lunch and at 12.50 p.m. I call for Keith. At 12.55 p.m. we go back to school and collect the milk. We are back in school from 1.30 until 3.15 p.m. when I go home. I haver a drink and watch television until tea time. At 6.45 p.m. I go swimming until 9 o'clock. Then I get my supper and take it to my room. I watch 'The Young Ones' and eat my supper. At 10 o'clock I go to sleep.
